Articles.Content: Let's say you've got 24 nuke engines, but want to make an extremely delicate course correction, it would be really nice if you could set all thrust limiters to the same value instead of having to do it individually.

Use an action group to shut them all down, then only turn on a couple of them?

Also low-powered RCS thrusters are really the best for extremely fine course corrections.

23 hours ago, Geonovast said:

Oh, I'm not saying there's no way to do this; simply no convenient way.  Not everything I build has RCS on it (like large stations).
